commenter-verify-post.SUBJECT: <%= comment.commenterName %> - Verify your comment.
commenter-verify-post.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_COMMENTED_HERE: It looks like you commented on a post here.
commenter-verify-post.WASNT_YOU_OR_REGRET: If this wasn't you or you regret what you said ignore this email and the comment will be removed in <%= removedInDays %> days.
commenter-verify-post.REMOVE_COMMENT: Remove This Comment
commenter-verify-post.USING_NAME_YOU_SAID: Using the name "<%= comment.commenterName %>" you said:

commenter-welcome.SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= comment.commenterName %>!
commenter-welcome.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_COMMENTED_HERE: It looks like you commented on a post here.
commenter-welcome.YOUR_COMMENT_END_THIS_EMAIL: Your comment is at the end of this email.
commenter-welcome.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_LINK: Please verify your account by clicking this link or the link in the verification email for your post.
commenter-welcome.YOU_CAN_CREATE_LOGIN_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
commenter-welcome.WASNT_YOU_OR_REGRET: If this wasn't you or you regret what you said ignore this email and the comment will be removed in <%= removedInDays %> days.
commenter-welcome.REMOVE_COMMENT: If you'd like to remove this comment now, click here
commenter-welcome.USING_NAME_YOU_SAID: Using the name "<%= comment.commenterName %>" you said:

commenter-verify-vote.SUBJECT: <%= commenterName %> - Verify your Vote.
commenter-verify-vote.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_VOTED_HERE: It looks like you voted on a post here.
commenter-verify-vote.WAS_YOU_IGNORE_THIS_EMAIL: If this wasn't you then ignore this email.

commenter-welcome-from-vote.SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= commenterName %>!
commenter-welcome-from-vote.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_VOTED_HERE: It looks like you voted on a post here.
commenter-welcome-from-vote.VERIFY_YOUR_VOTE_THIS_LINK: Please verify your vote by clicking this link or the link in the verification email for your vote.
commenter-welcome-from-vote.CREATE_NEW_LOGIN_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
commenter-welcome-from-vote.WASNT_YOU_IGNORE_EMAIL: If this wasn't you then ignore this email.

commenter-welcome-from-comment.SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= comment.commenterName %>!
commenter-welcome-from-comment.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_COMMENTED_HERE: It looks like you commented on a post here.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.YOUR_COMMENT_END_THIS_EMAIL: Your comment is at the end of this email.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_LINK: Please verify your account by clicking this link or the link in the verification email for your post.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.YOU_CAN_CREATE_LOGIN_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.WASNT_YOU_OR_REGRET: If this wasn't you or you regret what you said ignore this email and the comment will be removed in <%= removedInDays %> days.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.REMOVE_COMMENT: If you'd like to remove this comment now, click here
commenter-welcome-from-comment.USING_NAME_YOU_SAID: Using the name "<%= comment.commenterName %>" you said:

comment-ui.ENTER_EMAIL_TO_KEEP_COMMENT: Enter your email to keep your comment for longer than three days.
comment-ui.WONT_SEND_SOLIC_EMAILS: We won't send you any marketing or solicitation emails.
comment-ui.USERNAME_TAKEN: Looks like that username is taken by a different email.
comment-ui.FAILED_LOG_OUT: We hit a snag - failed to logout. Please try again later.
comment-ui.BILLING_INFO_INV_60_DAYS: This FastComments account's billing information is more than sixty days out of date. Comments hidden until the issue is resolved.
comment-ui.BILLING_INFO_INV: This FastComments account's billing information is out of date. Comments will be hidden after sixty days unless the issue is resolved.
comment-ui.DEMO_CREATE_ACCT: THIS IS A DEMO Create an Account
comment-ui.EXCEEDED_QUOTA: This FastComments account has exceeded its monthly quota and comments are now hidden. Upgrade
comment-ui.ALREADY_VOTED: You've already voted on this comment.
comment-ui.ENTER_EMAIL_VOTE: Enter your email to vote. We won't send you any marketing or solicitation emails.
comment-ui.NO_SOLICITATION_EMAILS: We won't send you any marketing or solicitation emails.
comment-ui.USERNAME_TAKEN_DIFF_EMAIL: That username is taken by a different email. If your email is correct, try a different username.
comment-ui.COMMENT_FLAGGED_SPAM: Your comment was flagged as spam. It might not show until it's approved.
comment-ui.AWAITING_APPROVAL_COMMENT: Your comment was submitted and will show once it is approved.
comment-ui.BANNED_COMMENTING: You have been banned from commenting on this site.
comment-ui.BANNED_VOTING: You have been banned from commenting on this site, which means you cannot vote either.
comment-ui.COMMENT_AWAITING_VERIFICATION: Your comment must be verified before it can show on this site. Check your email for a verification link.
comment-ui.USERNAME_CANT_BE_EMAIL: Your username can't be an email! It's publicly visible.
comment-ui.ERROR_MESSAGE: Whoops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
comment-ui.LOGIN_TO_EDIT: It's been a while since you left this comment. Please login to edit.
comment-ui.FAILED_TO_SAVE_EDIT: Failed to save! Please try again later.
comment-ui.DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete your comment?
comment-ui.LOGIN_TO_DELETE: It's been a while since you left this comment. Please login to delete.
comment-ui.DELETE_FAILURE: Failed to delete! Please try again later.
comment-ui.DOMAIN_NOT_AUTHORIZED: FastComments cannot load on this domain since it does not belong to your account. Add a domain here.
comment-ui.MALFORMED_SSO: Malformed SSO Request. Please check your FastComments installation.
comment-ui.VOTE_APPLIES_AFTER_VERIFICATION: Your vote will be applied after you click the verification link in your email.
comment-ui.COMMENTING_TOO_QUICKLY: You're commenting too quickly. Please wait a minute and try again.

tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.SUBJECT: FastComments Free Trial - 15 Days Left
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.FRIENDLY_REMINDER: This is a friendly reminder that you are halfway through your FastComments free trial.
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.COMMENTS_HAVE_BEEN_LEFT: <%= Number(commentCount).toLocaleString() %> comments have been left on your site(s).
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.VOTES_GIVEN: There have been <%= Number(voteCount).toLocaleString() %> votes on those comments.
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.USERS_SIGNED_UP: Last but not least, <%= Number(userCount).toLocaleString() %> users have signed up to use FastComments through <%= tenantName %>.
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.SIGN_IN_ENTER_BILLING_INFO: Sign in and Enter Payment Information

tenant-comment-digest.VIEW_MORE_COMMENTS: Moderate <%= abbreviateNumber(commentCount - comments.length, 0, locale) %> more comments
tenant-comment-digest.CHANGE_FREQUENCY: Change the frequency of this email.

tenant-free-trial-expired-reminder.SUBJECT: FastComments Billing Issue
tenant-free-trial-expired-reminder.FRIENDLY_REMINDER: This is a friendly reminder that your FastComments free trial HAS EXPIRED or you have a billing issue with your account.
tenant-free-trial-expired-reminder.SIGN_IN_ENTER_BILLING_INFO: Sign in and Enter Payment Information

commenter-comment-notification.SUBJECT: <%= abbreviateNumber(replyCount, 0, locale) %> <% if(replyCount === 1) {%>New Reply<% } else { %>New Replies<% } %> to <% if(replyCount > 1) { %>Your Comments<% } else {%>Your Comment<% } %>
commenter-comment-notification.PAST_HOUR_COMMENT_COUNT: In the past hour you've had <% if(replyCount > 1) { %>some replies<% } else { %>a reply<% } %> to your<% if(commentsSummary.length > 1) {%> comments<% } else { %> comment<% } %>.
commenter-comment-notification.UNSUBSCRIBE_HERE: Login and unsubscribe from these emails here

tenant-comment-notification.SUBJECT: <%= abbreviateNumber(commentCount, 0, locale) %> <% if(commentCount === 1) {%>New Comment<% } else { %>New Comments<% } %>
tenant-comment-notification.UNSUBSCRIBE_HERE: Login and unsubscribe from these emails here
tenant-comment-notification.HERE_ARE_LINKS_TO_PAGES: Here are the links to the pages those comments are on, with the count of comments for each.

forgot-username.SUBJECT: FastComments - Your Username
forgot-username.HERES_YOUR_USERNAME: Here's your username! Keep in mind your username is case-sensitive.

login.NEW_USER_SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= username %>! Verify & login to your account here
login.SUBJECT: Here's your login link <%= username %>
login.NEW_USER_THANKS_FOR_SIGNING_UP: Thanks for signing up to FastComments.
login.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_THIS_LINK: Please verify your account by clicking this link. This will also sign you in.
login.CAN_CREATE_NEW_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
login.CLICK_HERE_TO_LOGIN: Click here to login to FastComments.

user-help-acknowledged.SUBJECT: Help Request Acknowledged By Support Staff
user-help-acknowledged.ACKNOWLEDGED_BY_ADMIN: Looks like the support agent with the username "<%= adminUsername %>" has acknowledged your request. They should reach out to you shortly.
user-help-acknowledged.DONT_REPLY_TO_THIS: This email comes from an outbound-only email box - don't reply to it. We'll reach out to you separately.

tenant-user-removed-from-tenant.SUBJECT: You've Been Removed From <%= tenantName %>
tenant-user-removed-from-tenant.REMOVED_AS_ADMIN: It looks like you've been removed as a user from <%= tenantName %>. You will retain your FastComments account as a commenter, but you will no longer have access to <%= tenantName %>.

tenant-user-invite.INVITE_DETAILS: You've been invited to join the tenant <%= tenantName %>. Accepting this invite will elevate your commenter account into an administrator account. You'll have the following permissions:
tenant-user-invite.SUBJECT: You've been invited to join <%= tenantName %>!

tenant-new-user-invite.SUBJECT: You've been invited to join <%= tenantName %>!
tenant-new-user-invite.INVITE_DETAILS: You've been invited to join the FastComments tenant <%= tenantName %>. Accepting this invite will create an account for you with the following permissions:

commenter-comment-notification.PAST_HOUR_COMMENT_COUNT: In the past hour you've had <% if(replyCount > 1) { %>some replies<% } else { %>a reply<% } %> to your<% if(commentsSummary.length > 1) {%> comments<% } else { %> comment<% } %>.
commenter-comment-notification.UNSUBSCRIBE_HERE: Login and unsubscribe from these emails here

tenant-comment-notification.SUBJECT: <%= abbreviateNumber(commentCount, 0, locale) %> <% if(commentCount === 1) {%>New Comment<% } else { %>New Comments<% } %>
tenant-comment-notification.UNSUBSCRIBE_HERE: Login and unsubscribe from these emails here
tenant-comment-notification.HERE_ARE_LINKS_TO_PAGES: Here are the links to the pages those comments are on, with the count of comments for each.

forgot-username.SUBJECT: FastComments - Your Username
forgot-username.HERES_YOUR_USERNAME: Here's your username! Keep in mind your username is case-sensitive.

login.NEW_USER_SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= username %>! Verify & login to your account here
login.SUBJECT: Here's your login link <%= username %>
login.NEW_USER_THANKS_FOR_SIGNING_UP: Thanks for signing up to FastComments.
login.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_THIS_LINK: Please verify your account by clicking this link. This will also sign you in.
login.CAN_CREATE_NEW_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
login.CLICK_HERE_TO_LOGIN: Click here to login to FastComments.

user-help-acknowledged.SUBJECT: Help Request Acknowledged By Support Staff
user-help-acknowledged.ACKNOWLEDGED_BY_ADMIN: Looks like the support agent with the username "<%= adminUsername %>" has acknowledged your request. They should reach out to you shortly.
user-help-acknowledged.DONT_REPLY_TO_THIS: This email comes from an outbound-only email box - don't reply to it. We'll reach out to you separately.

tenant-user-removed-from-tenant.SUBJECT: You've Been Removed From <%= tenantName %>
tenant-user-removed-from-tenant.REMOVED_AS_ADMIN: It looks like you've been removed as a user from <%= tenantName %>. You will retain your FastComments account as a commenter, but you will no longer have access to <%= tenantName %>.

tenant-user-invite.INVITE_DETAILS: You've been invited to join the tenant <%= tenantName %>. Accepting this invite will elevate your commenter account into an administrator account. You'll have the following permissions:
tenant-user-invite.SUBJECT: You've been invited to join <%= tenantName %>!

tenant-new-user-invite.SUBJECT: You've been invited to join <%= tenantName %>!
tenant-new-user-invite.INVITE_DETAILS: You've been invited to join the FastComments tenant <%= tenantName %>. Accepting this invite will create an account for you with the following permissions:

commenter-comment-notification.PAST_HOUR_COMMENT_COUNT: In the past hour you've had <% if(replyCount > 1) { %>some replies<% } else { %>a reply<% } %> to your<% if(commentsSummary.length > 1) {%> comments<% } else { %> comment<% } %>.
commenter-comment-notification.SUBJECT: <%= abbreviateNumber(replyCount, 0, locale) %> <% if(replyCount === 1) {%>New Reply<% } else { %>New Replies<% } %> to <% if(replyCount > 1) { %>Your Comments<% } else {%>Your Comment<% } %>
commenter-comment-notification.UNSUBSCRIBE_HERE: Login and unsubscribe from these emails here

commenter-verify-post.SUBJECT: <%= comment.commenterName %> - Verify your comment.
commenter-verify-post.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_COMMENTED_HERE: It looks like you commented on a post here.
commenter-verify-post.WASNT_YOU_OR_REGRET: If this wasn't you or you regret what you said ignore this email and the comment will be removed in <%= removedInDays %> days.
commenter-verify-post.REMOVE_COMMENT: Remove This Comment

commenter-verify-vote.SUBJECT: <%= commenterName %> - Verify your Vote.
commenter-verify-vote.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_VOTED_HERE: It looks like you voted on a post here.
commenter-verify-vote.WAS_YOU_IGNORE_THIS_EMAIL: If this wasn't you then ignore this email.

commenter-welcome-from-comment.SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= comment.commenterName %>!
commenter-welcome-from-comment.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_COMMENTED_HERE: It looks like you commented on a post here.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.YOU_CAN_CREATE_LOGIN_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.WASNT_YOU_OR_REGRET: If this wasn't you or you regret what you said ignore this email and the comment will be removed in <%= removedInDays %> days.
commenter-welcome-from-comment.REMOVE_COMMENT: If you'd like to remove this comment now, click here
commenter-welcome-from-comment.USING_NAME_YOU_SAID: Using the name "<%= comment.commenterName %>" you said:

commenter-welcome-from-vote.SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= commenterName %>!
commenter-welcome-from-vote.LOOKS_LIKE_YOU_VOTED_HERE: It looks like you voted on a post here.
commenter-welcome-from-vote.CREATE_NEW_LOGIN_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
commenter-welcome-from-vote.WASNT_YOU_IGNORE_EMAIL: If this wasn't you then ignore this email.

forgot-username.SUBJECT: FastComments - Your Username
forgot-username.HERES_YOUR_USERNAME: Here's your username! Keep in mind your username is case-sensitive.

login.NEW_USER_SUBJECT: Welcome to FastComments <%= username %>! Verify & login to your account here
login.SUBJECT: Here's your login link <%= username %>
login.NEW_USER_THANKS_FOR_SIGNING_UP: Thanks for signing up to FastComments.
login.VERIFY_YOUR_ACCOUNT_THIS_LINK: Please verify your account by clicking this link. This will also sign you in.
login.CAN_CREATE_NEW_LINKS_HERE: You can create new links to log into your account here.
login.CLICK_HERE_TO_LOGIN: Click here to login to FastComments.

tenant-comment-digest.VIEW_MORE_COMMENTS: Moderate <%= abbreviateNumber(commentCount - comments.length, 0, locale) %> more comments
tenant-comment-digest.CHANGE_FREQUENCY: Change the frequency of this email.

tenant-comment-notification.SUBJECT: <%= abbreviateNumber(commentCount, 0, locale) %> <% if(commentCount === 1) {%>New Comment<% } else { %>New Comments<% } %>
tenant-comment-notification.UNSUBSCRIBE_HERE: Login and unsubscribe from these emails here
tenant-comment-notification.HERE_ARE_LINKS_TO_PAGES: Here are the links to the pages those comments are on, with the count of comments for each.

tenant-free-trial-expired-reminder.SUBJECT: FastComments Billing Issue
tenant-free-trial-expired-reminder.FRIENDLY_REMINDER: This is a friendly reminder that your FastComments free trial HAS EXPIRED or you have a billing issue with your account.
tenant-free-trial-expired-reminder.SIGN_IN_ENTER_BILLING_INFO: Sign in and Enter Payment Information

tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.SUBJECT: FastComments Free Trial - 15 Days Left
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.FRIENDLY_REMINDER: This is a friendly reminder that you are halfway through your FastComments free trial.
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.COMMENTS_HAVE_BEEN_LEFT: <%= Number(commentCount).toLocaleString() %> comments have been left on your site(s).
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.VOTES_GIVEN: There have been <%= Number(voteCount).toLocaleString() %> votes on those comments.
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.USERS_SIGNED_UP: Last but not least, <%= Number(userCount).toLocaleString() %> users have signed up to use FastComments through <%= tenantName %>.
tenant-free-trial-half-done-reminder.SIGN_IN_ENTER_BILLING_INFO: Sign in and Enter Payment Information

comment-ui.ENTER_EMAIL_TO_KEEP_COMMENT: Enter your email to keep your comment for longer than three days.
comment-ui.USERNAME_TAKEN: Looks like that username is taken by a different email.
comment-ui.USERNAME_CANT_BE_EMAIL: Your username can't be an email! It's publicly visible.
comment-ui.FAILED_LOG_OUT: We hit a snag - failed to logout. Please try again later.
comment-ui.BILLING_INFO_INV_60_DAYS: This FastComments account's billing information is more than sixty days out of date. Comments hidden until the issue is resolved.
comment-ui.BILLING_INFO_INV: This FastComments account's billing information is out of date. Comments will be hidden after sixty days unless the issue is resolved.
comment-ui.DEMO_CREATE_ACCT: THIS IS A DEMO Create an Account
comment-ui.EXCEEDED_QUOTA: This FastComments account has exceeded its monthly quota and comments are now hidden. Upgrade
comment-ui.ALREADY_VOTED: You've already voted on this comment.
comment-ui.ENTER_EMAIL_VOTE: Enter your email to vote. We won't send you any marketing or solicitation emails.
comment-ui.NO_SOLICITATION_EMAILS: We won't send you any marketing or solicitation emails.
comment-ui.USERNAME_TAKEN_DIFF_EMAIL: That username is taken by a different email. If your email is correct, try a different username.
comment-ui.COMMENT_FLAGGED_SPAM: Your comment was flagged as spam. It might not show until it's approved.
comment-ui.COMMENT_AWAITING_VERIFICATION: Your comment must be verified before it can show on this site. Check your email for a verification link.
comment-ui.AWAITING_APPROVAL_COMMENT: Your comment was submitted and will show once it is approved.
comment-ui.BANNED_COMMENTING: You have been banned from commenting on this site.
comment-ui.BANNED_VOTING: You have been banned from commenting on this site, which means you cannot vote either.
comment-ui.ERROR_MESSAGE: Whoops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
comment-ui.LOGIN_TO_EDIT: It's been a while since you left this comment. Please login to edit.
comment-ui.FAILED_TO_SAVE_EDIT: Failed to save! Please try again later.
comment-ui.DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete your comment?
comment-ui.LOGIN_TO_DELETE: It's been a while since you left this comment. Please login to delete.
comment-ui.DELETE_FAILURE: Failed to delete! Please try again later.
comment-ui.DOMAIN_NOT_AUTHORIZED: FastComments cannot load on this domain since it does not belong to your account. Add a domain here.
comment-ui.MALFORMED_SSO: Malformed SSO Request. Please check your FastComments installation.
comment-ui.VOTE_APPLIES_AFTER_VERIFICATION: Your vote will be applied after you click the verification link in your email.
comment-ui.COMMENTING_TOO_QUICKLY: You're commenting too quickly. Please wait a minute and try again.

comment-ui.COMMENT_FLAGGED_SPAM: Your comment was flagged as spam. It might not show until it's approved.
comment-ui.COMMENT_AWAITING_VERIFICATION: Your comment must be verified before it can show on this site. Check your email for a verification link.
comment-ui.AWAITING_APPROVAL_COMMENT: Your comment was submitted and will show once it is approved.
comment-ui.BANNED_COMMENTING: You have been banned from commenting on this site.
comment-ui.BANNED_VOTING: You have been banned from commenting on this site, which means you cannot vote either.
comment-ui.ERROR_MESSAGE: Whoops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
comment-ui.LOGIN_TO_EDIT: It's been a while since you left this comment. Please login to edit.
comment-ui.FAILED_TO_SAVE_EDIT: Failed to save! Please try again later.
comment-ui.DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete your comment?
comment-ui.LOGIN_TO_DELETE: It's been a while since you left this comment. Please login to delete.
comment-ui.DELETE_FAILURE: Failed to delete! Please try again later.
comment-ui.DOMAIN_NOT_AUTHORIZED: FastComments cannot load on this domain since it does not belong to your account. Add a domain here.
comment-ui.MALFORMED_SSO: Malformed SSO Request. Please check your FastComments installation.
comment-ui.VOTE_APPLIES_AFTER_VERIFICATION: Your vote will be applied after you click the verification link in your email.
comment-ui.COMMENTING_TOO_QUICKLY: You're commenting too quickly. Please wait a minute and try again.

tenant-user-removed-from-tenant.SUBJECT: You've Been Removed From <%= tenantName %>
tenant-user-removed-from-tenant.REMOVED_AS_ADMIN: It looks like you've been removed as a user from <%= tenantName %>. You will retain your FastComments account as a commenter, but you will no longer have access to <%= tenantName %>.

tenant-user-invite.INVITE_DETAILS: You've been invited to join the tenant <%= tenantName %>. Accepting this invite will elevate your commenter account into an administrator account. You'll have the following permissions:
tenant-user-invite.SUBJECT: You've been invited to join <%= tenantName %>!

tenant-new-user-invite.SUBJECT: You've been invited to join <%= tenantName %>!
tenant-new-user-invite.INVITE_DETAILS: You've been invited to join the FastComments tenant <%= tenantName %>. Accepting this invite will create an account for you with the following permissions:
